name: Defected presents Loco Dice In The House
description: The union of Loco Dice and Defected Records may at first seem like an unlikely one, but when you consider that both artist and label have tirelessly fought to promote the best in techno and house respectively for over a decade, the pieces begin to fall into place. Defected presents Loco Dice In The House exemplifies the open-minded attitude to electronic music embraced by both label and artist, and delivers a truly unique and timeless listening experience. Now available as a limited edition 2CD release, with bespoke packaging that includes a fold out poster. For Digital copies please click here iTunes. PLEASE NOTE: If you order after 16/12/13 we can’t guarantee delivery before 25/12/13 due to the festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: Loco Dice In The House 12" Album Sampler LTD Vinyl
description: One of the most unexpected collaborations of recent memory, Defected presents Loco Dice In The House is the most explosive dance music compilation of the year. Here four tracks from the release are exclusively presented in this limited edition vinyl sampler. Loco Dice In The House exemplifies the open-minded attitude to electronic music embraced by both label and artist, and delivers a truly unique and timeless listening experience. Click here for iTunes. PLEASE NOTE: All items will be shipped, once in stock, via an express service during this festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: Noir In The House 12" Album Sampler LTD Vinyl
description: Noir drops two brand new remixes, from his forthcoming Noir In The House compilation. For lovers of house and techno, Noir should really need no introduction. Unquestionably one of the most talented electronic artists in the world, through his highly energetic DJ sets, sublime productions and acclaimed label Noir Music he has tirelessly built a reputation as a leader in his field. Notable releases include his collaboration with Haze ‘Around’, the Solomun remix of which has been the undisputed deep house anthem of the last 18 months, demonstrating Noir’s exceptional ear and propensity for being ahead of the game in nurturing world-class talent. This has since been cemented by signings such as NICe7 and Hot Since 82 to his label, proving his skills as an A&R are of an equally exemplary standard to those as a recording artist. Here he drops two brand new remixes, both of which can be found on his upcoming Noir In The House compilation, released 28th January on Defected Records. First up is his reworking of one of the biggest Ibiza bombs of recent memory, Intruder’s unifying ‘Amame’. Stripping things back to a bare, hypnotic groove, Noir allows the unmistakable vocal of Jei to float silkily over the raw percussion and twisted stabs of synth, creating a darkly persuasive record perfect for those deeper moments. Noir then heads further back in time, plucking Jason Jink’s seminal ‘Your First Time’ from his dusty shelves and smartening it up for today’s dancefloors. Heavily beefed drums and skittering hats add a distinct new dimension as Noir preserves the driving bass and sultry vocal. For lovers of the original record, this version offers the perfect update while simultaneously introducing it to new fans across the world. Click here for iTunes. PLEASE NOTE: All items will be shipped, once in stock, via an express service during this festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: FCL 'It's You Remixes' (Mr. Fingers / MK / Flashmob) Album Sampler
description: The record that keeps on keeping on! To begin with it was only the FCL guys themselves and a few trusted friends who had a copy of this ferociously uplifting vocal record, but We Play House Recordings eventually released vinyl copies of the record late last year. Now signed to Defected and played, heard, sung and screamed everywhere from Berlin to Miami, this remix package from 2 of the most established names in House Music and one of the hottest guarantees that it’s surely set to conquer the Mediterranean over the Summer months. Click here for iTunes. PLEASE NOTE: If you order after 16/12/13 we can’t guarantee delivery before 25/12/13 due to the festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: Storm Queen 'Look Right Through' (Jamie Jones / Art Department Remixes) LTD Vinyl
description: After Morgan Geist and Damon C. Scott's triumphant second single as Storm Queen - "It Goes On" - it's time to revisit their 2010 smash hit single, "Look Right Through". By way of 6 new remixes from 5 of the hottest producers currently on the scene we are pleased to present these two super hot releases. Part 1 features 2 of the 6 mixes and we begin with RA's DJ of the year 2011, Jamie Jones. Characteristic bass and rhythm lay the foundtion for the track that's already being championed by Pete Tong among many others. Next up the duo of Kenny Glasgow & Jonny White that is Art Department retain the catchy hook of the original and introduce a rubbery melodic bass line that's sure to slay all in its path. Click here for iTunes. PLEASE NOTE: All items will be shipped, once in stock, via an express service during this festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: Pirupa 'Party Non Stop' (Huxley Remix) LTD Vinyl
description: Big tune alert! These white label hand stamped promos will be worth their weight in gold for any self respecting DJ planning on staying ahead of the curve over the coming months. The man of the moment Huxley (Hypercolour / 2020 / Cecile) adds a new remix to this package that's released in advance of digital. Peak time party gear, as the title would suggest. Only 250 hand stamped copies in existence. Click here for iTunes. PLEASE NOTE: All items will be shipped, once in stock, via an express service during this festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: Noir & Haze 'Around' (Solomun / MURK / Subb-An remixes) LTD Vinyl
description: “Around” might come as a surprise for many club-heads as Noir usually produces club tracks and is now moving into the “electronic songs” area.However “Around” makes the perfect transition for Noir as it refletcs some of his trademark club-sounds mixed with the new melodic and more in-depth electronic sound. This 12" vinyl contains two exclusive remixes from Subb-an and the MURKed Vocal Mix along with the much loved Solomon remix which was one of the hit singles of 2011 Click here for iTunes. PLEASE NOTE: If you order after 16/12/13 we can’t guarantee delivery before 25/12/13 due to the festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: Candi Staton 'Hallelujah Anyway' (Larse Remixes) LTD Vinyl
description: Candi Staton has legacy beyond compare. Responsible for some of the most memorable and best loved soul records of all time, Staton has a voice that is currently captivating a new generation of music lovers just as it did when she first burst onto the music scene as a soul siren in the ‘70s. Staton’s latest single is ‘Hallelujah Anyway’; a timeless, feel-good soul record typical of Staton’s overwhelmingly positive musical message, now released with a subtly infectious remix from Larse. Here he goes deep with a club-ready cut that demonstrates the versatility of Staton’s vocal, sitting proudly over a beautifully melancholic piece of production….and is already becoming one of the vocal records of the summer 2012 season. Click here for iTunes. PLEASE NOTE: All items will be shipped, once in stock, via an express service during this festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: Intruder (A Murk Production) 'Amame' (Radio Slave remixes) LTD Vinyl
description: 'What's this tune?' is a question DJs are asked frequently, though very rarely by each other. 'Amame' has been floating around a very select DJ circle on limited vinyl pressing for some four months, and the question has evolved to 'how can I get hold of this tune?' 'Amame' is a Murk production from Oscar G and Ralph Falcon under the guise of Intruder. Any Murk production is a rare thing, and a record of this quality and breadth of appeal is perhaps even rarer. Effortlessly straddling the often tricky to navigate border between house and techno, it features one of the most hypnotically memorable vocals of the year courtesy of Jei. Already being championed by the likes of Kerri Chandler, Dennis Ferrer, Seth Troxler and even Ricardo Villalobos has ensured that all those loitering around the booths of DC10's closing party and Fabric's birthday were enquiring of its story. Now the story can begin to be told… For part two Radio Slave gets both sides of the record to render his unmistakable style and production qualities to the original parts. These versions are super heavy and intoxicating even by his standards. Hand stamped white label pressing. Click here for iTunes. PLEASE NOTE: If you order after 16/12/13 we can’t guarantee delivery before 25/12/13 due to the festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: DJ Spen 'Fall Down On Me' Ltd Edition EP
description: Championed by a certain Mr D. Carter for an age and a staple of Derricks sets, both in it's original form and as the accapella layered atop of a variety of oddities.. This massive DJ Spen sing-along finally gets an official release on The Classic Music Company. This particular limited vinyl release with custom wall paper labels sees the inclusion of the original and exclusive vinyl only accapella. Additionally there’s a freestyle version that Derrick stumbled across whilst DJing in Denver, expertly placing the accapella live over an old 1200 Warriors, Derrick wanted to include this version on the record as a homage to Richie Rich's Salsa House bootleg. To round off the package he then set about destroying the original vocal with trademark BHQ cut ups and a baseline that harks back to Leslie Joy's "Love and Happiness". PLEASE NOTE: If you order after 16/12/13 we can’t guarantee delivery before 25/12/13 due to the festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: Grand Corporation 'Wonder & Amazement' Ltd Edition Vinyl
description: Wonder & Amazement is a record I’ve had in various forms and incarnations from ex Chicken Lips members Steve Kotey & Andy Meecham for about a year now – a song that immediately grabbed me from the very first moment I heard it. Reminiscent of days gone by mixed with a touch of the new - a song that contains a mixture of both the old Classic and the new Classic. I’ve been championing it for a while now either in sets or charts, even including it on a recent compilation I did. A record that we are proud to be able to use as a soundtrack to this new era of Classic. Adding to its unique wonder we talked to a few amazing producers to get their own vibes on it for remixes. Crooked Man aka DJ Parrott I’ve been a fan of for years as part of The All Seeing Eye, his recent ‘Machine’, ‘Preset’ and ‘Ill Be Loving You’ releases (all of which I actually tried to sign to Classic) and for generally being a bit of a Sheffield legend. Here his two mixes are exactly what I hoped for from him. Deetron’s productions and remixes I’ve liked for ages and he seemed to be the right person to go to to give this record that bigger mix it needed. Yosa, is a completely under-rated Japanese producer in my eyes, who’s recent records have stayed in my sets for a long long time – the vocal & Instrumental mix delivered here are his second attempt, stripping back the unnecessary fiddly bits and keeping it bare to the bones…classic. PLEASE NOTE: If you order after 16/12/13 we can’t guarantee delivery before 25/12/13 due to the festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: The Hue 'Criss Cross EP' Ltd Edition Vinyl
description: Two original Classic members return too Classic with an adventure into the world of disco deviance. Tim Kavnosky (co-writer with Tim Shumaker from Home and Garden fame) and JT Donaldson (Undercover Agency) joining forces here, utilising their wealth of musical knowledge and inspiration to make something that melds the likes of Wally Badarou, the System and Maurice Fulton. A little more left field for Classic after recent releases, but Classic nonetheless. Various interpretations of a mini LP to be released in the next few months…on this particular vinyl only version. Classic adds both Eddie C's disco adventure and the illusive Argentinean Leonel Castillo to the fold. Both of whom turn in stellar performances. PLEASE NOTE: If you order after 16/12/13 we can’t guarantee delivery before 25/12/13 due to the festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: No Dial Tone 'About You EP' (Mic Newmann Tom Ellis Remixes) LTD Vinyl
description: ‘Classic prides itself in being a family. Generally a lot of the music we have put out over the years tends to gravitate towards us either through friends, friends of friend, or odd situations. When that music has found its way to us through friends and people that are already part of the Classic family, in this case via JT Donaldson, Derrick and myself always stand up and take notice even more as we know there is usually a story behind it. As a result, we are proud to welcome No Dial Tone as new members to the oddball family made up of miscreants and weirdos that is Classic. A record I immediately fell in love with due to its quirky rhythms and repeating vocal, ‘About You’ is a record that seemed to have Classic written all over it. We drafted in 2 new rising stars to give their interpretations - from the deep old school rhythms of Mic Newman, to the music led jazz tinged vibes of Tom Ellis.’ Luke Solomon, June 2012 PLEASE NOTE: If you order after 16/12/13 we can’t guarantee delivery before 25/12/13 due to the festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: The Digital Kid Versus The World 'Minor Analogue Experiment Ep' LTD Vinyl
description: The idea was to always make the original album a digital only project, hence the name… That in turn made me think of the idea of doing an analogue only version of peoples interpretations of songs that they chose off of the album. So I approached four of my favourite producers of the moment that I felt fitted with the whole project. Originally asking Ryan Elliott to do one of the mixes…he then spoke to his good friend Matthew Dear, who in turn asked to be involved as he has always been a huge fan of Classic, and wanted to be involved…which of course we said yes to, so im truly honoured to have both Ryan & Matthew combining for the very first time here on Classic. Add to Ryan & Matthew - Tom Demac, Chicago Damn and Snuff Crew and we’ve ended up with a four track vinyl sampler that has complemented the album wonderfully and again showcases another completely different character of Classic. Luke Solomon PLEASE NOTE: If you order after 16/12/13 we can’t guarantee delivery before 25/12/13 due to the festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days

name: No Dial Tone / James Curd 'Standing Stil / Gentle Help EP' LTD Vinyl
description: A double EP release from the Classic Music Company, mixing together friends old and new from the label. Recent signings to Classic, No Dial Tone deliver their second original production to the imprint ‘Standing Still’ – a deep slow burning almost Bjork-esq vocal record kicks off the A side. Long time label cohort from the early Bar Rumba days; Mathew Herbert twists and turns the record into something completely ‘Herbert’ and ultimately ‘classic’ in its make up. On the flip...long-time Greenskeepers man James Curd returns to Classic with nothing short of a BUMP! ‘Gentle Help’ is typical Curd Funk and now with added Black Madonna flavours. Road tested relentlessly at the Smart Bar, the Chicago native channels the essence of old Dance Mania records and funnels it into something typically a little left of centre. Each track is uniquely different and recognisably Classic. PLEASE NOTE: If you order after 16/12/13 we can’t guarantee delivery before 25/12/13 due to the festive season. UK - next day delivery Europe - 1-2 days ROW - 3-5 days
